name: Freelance
work: Led full-stack development projects from planning to deployment, collaborating closely with clients to define scope and deliver scalable solutions in an agile environment.

Handled third-party integrations including payment gateways, AWS SNS notifications, and monitoring/logging tools for cloud-based systems.
Led Agile/Scrum practices including sprint planning, retrospectives, backlog grooming, and daily stand-ups to ensure delivery alignment.
Conducted client communications, stakeholder management, budget estimation, and resource allocation for successful project outcomes.
Supported hiring efforts, conducted technical interviews, and contributed to business development through solution design and consulting.
